comments.comments_text: Joshua Kimmich (Bayern Munich) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Joshua Kimmich (Bayern Munich) is cleared.

comments.comments_text: It looks like Maximilian Mittelstadt (Hertha Berlin) saw red with that tackle. Patrick Ittrich won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Joshua Kimmich sends a superb cross into the box. Serge Gnabry (Bayern Munich) latches on to it and from near the penalty spot powers a header low inside the right post, leaving Oliver Christensen beaten. He displayed his eye for goal there - excellent finish. The score is 1:0.
